body_content.explanation: a birdwatcher (= someone whose hobby is watching wild birds in their natural environment), especially one who tries to see birds that are rare in a particular area, and is willing to travel long distances to do this :
examples: Obsessive twitchers may endanger their health and their relationships as they rush around the country in search of the latest rarity.
Twitchers inform each other of rare sightings by means of websites and text messages.
